title: PSA T206 Pittsburgh Pirates For Sale ALL SOLD
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: PSA T206 Pittsburgh Pirates For Sale ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
THE CARDS HAVE ALL BEEN SOLD. Thank you.

Hi,

I have 15 of the T206 Pittsburgh Pirates for sale. These 15 cards are all graded by PSA. The grades range from PSA 3 through PSA 6. There are three PSA 6 cards, including the Clarke portrait. Along with these three, the other cards are very nice for the grade. Most are perfectly centered.

To buy the cards, you can contact me at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

I prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order. But I will accept PayPal and checks, too.

To view the cards, with prices, click the following link:
[url]http://www.cyscards.com/t206.htm[/url]

Thanks.

Cy
